member.name: T:LiteQueue.LiteQueue`1
member.summary:
Uses LiteDB to provide a persisted, thread safe, (optionally) transactional, FIFO queue.
Suitable for use on clients as a lightweight, portable alternative to MSMQ. Not recommended for use on large server side applications due to performance limitations of LiteDB.

member.name: P:LiteQueue.LiteQueue`1.IsTransactional
member.summary: Impacts operation of method. Can only be set once in constructor.

member.name: M:LiteQueue.LiteQueue`1.#ctor(LiteDB.LiteDatabase,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a collection for you in the database
member.param: The LiteDB database. You are responsible for its lifecycle (using/dispose)
Name of the collection to create
Whether the queue should use transaction logic, default true

member.summary: Uses the provided database collection
member.param: A LiteDB collection.
Whether the queue should use transaction logic, default true

member.summary: Transactional queues: Marks item as checked out but does not remove from queue. You are expected to later call or Non-transactional queues: Removes item from queue with no need to call or
member.returns: An item if found or null

member.summary: Batch equivalent of
member.param: The maximum number of items to dequeue
member.returns: The items found or an empty collection (never null)

member.name: M:LiteQueue.LiteQueue`1.CurrentCheckouts
member.summary: Obtains list of items currently checked out (but not yet commited or aborted) as a result of Dequeue calls on a transactional queue
member.exception: Thrown when queue is not transactional
member.returns: Items found or empty collection (never null)

member.name: M:LiteQueue.LiteQueue`1.ResetOrphans
member.summary: Aborts all currently checked out items. Equivalent of calling followed by
member.exception: Thrown when queue is not transactional

member.summary: Aborts a transaction on a single item. See for batches.

member.exception: Thrown when queue is not transactional

member.exception: Thrown when queue is not transactional

member.exception: Thrown when queue is not transactional

member.summary: Number of items in queue, including those that have been checked out.
